net.proteusframework.users.model.dao

Class PermissionDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.i2rd.hibernate.AbstractProcessor<AcegiPermission>
      • net.proteusframework.users.model.dao.PermissionDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.i2rd.hibernate.EntityProcessor<AcegiPermission>, InitializingBean

    @Repository
public class PermissionDAO
extends com.i2rd.hibernate.AbstractProcessor<AcegiPermission>
    Default processor for perms.
    Author:
    Ken Logan (ken@i2rd.com)

    • Constructor Detail

      • PermissionDAO

    • Method Detail

      • changePermissionName

        public void changePermissionName(AcegiPermission perm,
                                 String name)
        Set a new name on a permission.

        NOTE:
        This should never be called from UI code. An AcegiPermission is considered immutable by code referencing it. This would typically be called by data conversion code.

        Parameters:
        perm - the permission.
        name - the new name.

      • changePermissionNameAndPolicyLevel

        public void changePermissionNameAndPolicyLevel(AcegiPermission perm,
                                               String name,
                                               CredentialPolicyLevel level)
        Set a new name and policy level on a permission.

        NOTE:
        This should never be called from UI code. An AcegiPermission is considered immutable by code referencing it. This would typically be called by data conversion code.

        Parameters:
        perm - the permission.
        name - the new name.
        level - the new level.

      • getAllStoredPermissionTypes

        public List<Class<? extends AcegiPermission>> getAllStoredPermissionTypes()
        Get the permission type for all of the permissions currently stored in the database.
        Returns:
        the list of types.

      • getEntityType

        public Class<AcegiPermission> getEntityType()
        Specified by:
        getEntityType in interface com.i2rd.hibernate.EntityProcessor<AcegiPermission>
        Specified by:
        getEntityType in class com.i2rd.hibernate.AbstractProcessor<AcegiPermission>

      • getPermission

        public <T extends AcegiPermission> T getPermission(Class<T> type,
                                                   String name,
                                                   CredentialPolicyLevel level,
                                                   String... action)
        Retrieve a permission with the specified name, actions, and type if one exists. If one doesn't exist yet, create one.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the AcegiPermission type.
        Parameters:
        name - the permission name.
        level - the new level.
        action - zero or more actions.
        type - the type of permission.
        Returns:
        always returns a persistence AcegiPermission instance.

      • getPermissionCriteria

        public Criteria getPermissionCriteria(Class<? extends AcegiPermission> type)
        Get a criteria for a permission type. Use this to get permissions with additional constraints as this will let Hibernate handle the query parameters.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of permission to retrieve
        Returns:
        the criteria

      • getPermissionsByNamePrefix

        public List<AcegiPermission> getPermissionsByNamePrefix(String namePrefix)
        Get all permissions of a specified type (no-subtypes included)
        Parameters:
        namePrefix - Match permissions whose name starts with this.
        Returns:
        list of the permissions
